participant_abstract.sent: Florence (PM) went over the previous meeting and outlined the agenda for this one, then asked Steph (UID) and me (ID) to present the prototype devices we'd designed.
These were well received by the group.
Sarah (ME) explained the product evaluation criteria and took us through a discussion and rating of each aspect.
She then calculated the average evaluation marks, which were high.
Florence showed the costing spreadsheet and we worked out the design costs as a group.
Happily we were comfortably within budget.
We were therefore able to close the meeting early, amid much satisfaction and mutual congratulation.

participant_decisions.sent: Plastic case with spongy rubber components .
Yellow case with small number of large black buttons (company colours).
Evaluation marks all between 1 and 2 except for technological innovation.
Finalised design within development budget cost.

participant_problems.sent: Found it hard to decide between rigid plastic and spongy rubber; marketing prefer latter, PM and UID concerned about robustness though; compromised on mixed component construction.
All other remaining problems resolved at this meeting.
